column4: hiya ppl is there a threaded encoding app for ubuntu im using devede which uses mencoder but that only uses one core ;(
I looked and looked and looked... and found out that its best to use mencoder from the command line
It has a pretty intuitive interface actually.
surprisingly, youll wind up prefering it. Every time you leave out something it will tell you whats missing, and you can quickly look up a list of your options.
